Name: sosa:Observation
Definition: Act of carrying out an observation.

Name: sosa:Actuation
Definition: Act of applying a change to a FeatureOfInterest.

Name: sosa:FeatureOfInterest
Definition: Entity whose property is observed, acted on, or sampled.

Name: sosa:ObservableProperty
Definition: Property of a FeatureOfInterest that can be observed.

Name: sosa:ActuatableProperty
Definition: Property of a FeatureOfInterest that can be acted upon.

Name: sosa:Result
Definition: Result of an Observation, Actuation, or Sampling.

Name: sosa:Procedure
Definition: Method, algorithm, or workflow for an Observation, Actuation, or Sampling.

Name: sosa:Platform
Definition: Entity that hosts Sensors, Actuators, or Samplers.

Name: sosa:System
Definition: System capable of performing Observations, Actuations, or Samplings.

Name: sosa:Sensor
Definition: Device, agent, or system that performs Observations.

Name: sosa:Actuator
Definition: Device, agent, or system that performs Actuations.

Name: sosa:Sampler
Definition: Device, agent, or system that makes Samples.

Name: sosa:Sample
Definition: Subset or extract of a FeatureOfInterest.

Name: sosa:Deployment
Definition: Activity of deploying a System on a Platform.

Name: sosa:resultTime
Definition: Time when the result became available.

Name: sosa:implements
Definition: Relation between a System and a Procedure.

Name: sosa:hasUltimateFeatureOfInterest
Definition: Links an Observation to the ultimate FeatureOfInterest.
